SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into delivery_order (order_no, creator_id, creator, sender_name, sender_mobile, receiver_online_user_id, receiver_mobile, receiver_name, receiver_company, receiver_company_id, driver_online_user_id, driver_name, driver_mobile, vehicle_id, driver_plate_number, driver_leave_time, send_time, start_addr, end_addr, distance, est_arrival_time, actual_arrival_time, load_status, location_certificate, quality_certificate, qrcode_url, is_auth_pay, info_integrity, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_delete) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{senderMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverOnlineUserId}, #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverOnlineUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{driverPlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distance,jdbcType=REAL}, #{estArrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actualArrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loadStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locationCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qualityCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAuthPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{infoIntegrity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update delivery_order
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sender_name = #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sender_mobile = #{senderMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_online_user_id = #{receiver_online_user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_company = #{receiverCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_company_id = #{receiverCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
driver_online_user_id = #{driverOnlineUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_mobile = #{driverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
driver_plate_number = #{driverPlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_leave_time = #{driverLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_addr = #{startAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_addr = #{endAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
distance = #{distance,jdbcType=REAL},
est_arrival_time = #{estArrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
actual_arrival_time = #{actualArrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
load_status = #{loadStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
location_certificate = #{locationCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
quality_certificate = #{qualityCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_auth_pay = #{isAuthPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
info_integrity = #{infoIntegrity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update delivery_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_name = #{senderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sender_mobile = #{senderMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_online_user_id = #{receiverOnlineUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, receiver_mobile = #{receiverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_company = #{receiverCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_company_id = #{receiverCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, driver_online_user_id = #{driverOnlineUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, driver_name = #{driverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_mobile = #{driverMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, driver_plate_number = #{driverPlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_leave_time = #{driverLeaveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_addr = #{startAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_addr = #{endAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distance = #{distance,jdbcType=REAL}, est_arrival_time = #{estArrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, actual_arrival_time = #{actualArrivalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, load_status = #{loadStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location_certificate = #{locationCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quality_certificate = #{qualityCertificate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qrcode_url = #{qrcodeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_auth_pay = #{isAuthPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info_integrity = #{infoIntegrity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT
from delivery_order where receiver_company_id = #{companyId} AND status in (0,1,2,3,4)
